predicate.note: Frames file for 'atrophy' based on sentences from ectb 2. Verbnet class 45.4, other members include activate, age, balance, blur, darken, hasten, laminate, magnetize, revive, ripen, sicken, stabilize, sour, tilt, unwind, whiten.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: This meant that urine could flow back into the kidney * causing the kidney to atrophy.
